Column I Column II
Electoral District Assistant Returning Officers
I fldgi ( ^I& fPoh - YS% ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l iudcjd§ ckrcfha w;s úfYI .eiÜ m;%h -  2015'08'09
PART I : SEC. (I) - GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA - 09.08.2015
1A
PARLIAMENTARY  ELECTIONS  ACT,  No.  1  OF  1981
IN the exercise of the powers vested in me by Section 6 (1) of the Parliamentary Elections Act, No. 1 of 1981, I, Mahinda
Deshapriya, Commissioner of Elections do by this Notice appoint the persons mentioned in Column II of the Schedule hereto
as Assistant Returning Officers to assist the Returning Officer of the Electoral District specified in the corresponding
entry in Column I of the Schedule in the performance of the duties of such Returning Officer in connection with the
Parliamentary General Election to be held on 17th August, 2015.
M
AHINDA DESHAPRIYA,
Commissioner of Elections.
Elections Secretariat,
Sarana Mawatha,
Rajagiriya.
09th August, 2015.
Schedule
ELECTORAL DISTRICT No. 01 - COLOMBO
Column I Column II
Electoral District Assistant Returning Officers
Colombo Henarath Hettiarachchige Sisira Piyasiri,
Veterinary Officer,
Veterinary Office,
Homagama.
H. B. Ratnayaka,
Livestock Development Instructor,
Veterinary Office,
Homagama.
